item.title: CLR events: go for the nettrace file format!
item.description: Let’s see how to listen to CLR event through EventPipe in C++. This episode explains how to start/stop a session with a running .NET app.

item.title: The Two Definitions of Zettelkasten
item.description: What do we mean when we say Zettelkasten? There’s a specific set of objects (cards and boxes or their digital equivalents), but there’s also a spectrum of methods or practices which can be split into two broad categories.

item.title: Big Ass Fans introduces revamped Haiku app
item.description: Big Ass Fans® today introduced an updated version of its Haiku® ceiling fan control app for Android devices. Easier to use, faster and just all around more incredible, the app offers unprecedented control options for the company’s Haiku residential ceiling fans. The company’s extensive engineering team worked directly with customers throughout the year-long development process, […]
